articles.description: We're expanding Gemini access in India with the launch of the Gemini app in English and nine Indian languages. We're also expanding Gemini Advanced to nine Indian languages, powered by Gemini 1.5 Pro, and launching Gemini in Google Messages in English.
articles.content: To access Gemini on Android, download the Gemini app or opt-in through Google Assistant. You can then use Gemini by corner swiping, hitting the power button on select phones, or saying "Hey Google." … [+2950 chars]
